hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is

based on an illusion which will shatter
let's get into the economic collapse
financial news now it looks like the
illusion is continuing and we can see
they're not letting up they want
everyone to believe and Trump is out
there and he is telling everyone look at
all these jobs that we are creating and
he's saying that this is fantastic now
once again this is part of the old
system nothing has really changed he
didn't bring any jobs back into the
United States he didn't create these
incredible manufacturing jobs what he's
doing right now is he's playing into
what they've been pushing all along
think about it
what policies has he put forth to make
all of this happen nothing so what does

there and say yes this is working
because this is what they've been saying
all along now let's take a look at these

is out there telling us how great they
are Trump is out there telling us how
great they are telling us that the
economy is at full strength
now the BLS reported that in July us
added about two hundred nine thousand
jobs now that beat the consensus
expectations of around 180 thousand now
June was revised higher to 231 from two
hundred and twenty two thousand even as
May was revised lower from 152 to 145 so
there was a net gain of about two
thousand in the prior two months now
when we look at the jobs what jobs are
being added well bars restaurants while
they hired the most workers of any
sector in July now keep in mind
that the July gain was all in the
seasonal adjustment factor unadjusted
jobs declined by 1.30 8 million now the
unemployment rate dropped from four
point four percent to four point three
percent we're almost at full employment
here in the United States does this look
like a country that is fully employed no
it doesn't why would retail be crumbling
apart it doesn't make sense why would
the housing market be stalling right now
why aren't corporations making the sales
why are there so many people out of the
labor force market I mean think about it
the whole thing doesn't make sense now
the participation rate it rose from
sixty two point eight percent to 62
point nine percent so that's really
meaningless at this point and what we're
seeing is that these jobs that are being
created there the low-level jobs now
think back when Obama was bringing in
all these illegal immigrants and they
wanted to bring in a lot of these
refugees now to boost GDP and to make
sure that the economy continually
operates what and this is part of the
agenda why they were bringing in

homes their cars and everything else
they were set at a different level when
they lost their jobs and they were
taking these part-time jobs maybe they
have two part-time jobs there were a lot
of low low level jobs that no one was
filling to keep GDP up and to keep the
job rate looking good they needed to
fill these this way
can manipulate the numbers a lot better
now the gap between the unemployment
rate and the unemployment to population
ratio remains very very wide now digging
through the numbers reveal some
troubling features the household survey
reported that an impressive 345 thousand
jobs were added more than 50 percent
higher than the establishment survey now
the bulk of these jobs like we said
they're part-time now according to the
BLS in July three hundred ninety three
thousand part-time jobs were added
54,000 full-time jobs were added that's
it so we have a major problem here so
this was the biggest increase in
part-time jobs going all the way back to
September of 2016 now where the jobs we
said before they are in food services
drinking plates places waiters and
bartenders that's where they are right
now
even though the restaurant Performance
Index is continually dropping remember a
lot of these individuals they can hire
them they get paid very minute they get
minimum wage here they make a lot of
their money on tips so it doesn't cost
the restaurants that much so now there
have been 89 consecutive months without

now these jobs fall in the category of

around 331 dollars a week now if we look
at the professional and business
services that added around 49,000 jobs
within this category administrative and

temp workers added 14,000 jobs almost
15,000 actually healthcare added 39,000
with job gains occurring in ambulatory

and once again they're low-paying jobs
so what we have right here is two things
happening we have students who are
graduating high school then going to
college
and this huge gigantic student loans

looking for this full-time job and it's

well only that number was filled the
rest were part-time jobs and when we

graduate right now they cannot find work
out in the workplace they can't find

make what they need to make to pay back
their student loan al-ahli these
individuals are trying to find a

listen if I give you this part-time job
I know once a full-time job comes by

well it's on the lower level so we can

this economy still under what Obama the

Oh BOM AX started Obama care this
incredible health insurance that
everyone's gonna love how else do you

you can try repealing it but that

right now now the central bankers
they're out there and they just can't

now the Organisation for Economic

consumer prices across the g20 the

percent higher than
year earlier now the last time inflation

that they can't figure out you know how
this occurred why inflation is not

no inflation inflation is falling and
they just can't figure out why now in
general when they calculate inflation
asset prices do not count bubbles in
stocks and bonds they do not count
instead of using home prices in the CPI
they now use owners equivalent rent so
their calculation in figuring inflation
has been changed to trick everyone that
there is no inflation and we know what

bonds into stocks into housing across

don't know they do know they know

tuition you can see it in food and I'm
not talking about the GMO box foods I'm

yes as gas prices came down food prices

they're on the rise once again we saw it
in meats so you can see inflation they

that in to their inflation calculation
and they've done this on purpose to make
everyone believe that there is no

credit
and right now Bank of America credit

they coined a new term now we know that

they're very worried about this and of

and they're saying because of that we

everything that the Fed has done over

already the credit markets they've

there are more individuals looking at

we know exactly how this economy is

we're watching the economy fell on its

remember when Obama was in office they

it always looks great on the surface

once the shelves are clear that this

well they're gonna trickle in because

the system was built on an illusion they
